text: @realDonaldTrump The "Invisible Enemy" U REFERENCE is the Coronavirus that you enabled b/c you don't believe in experts when they give you real data!  But the "REAL ENEMY" is the self-indulgent IDIOT in the WH @realDonaldTrump. Don't worry about 2020 UR as good as GONE!
